      • setBounds

        private void setBounds(int i,
             int left,
             int top,
             int right,
             int bottom)
        This method sets an array of Insets containing the components sizes of the settings screen.
        Parameters:
        i - An int value that represents the order the component is placed.
        left - An int value that represents the left position of the component.
        top - An int value that represents the top position of the component.
        right - An int value that represents the right position of the component.
        bottom - An int value that represents the bottom position of the component.
